text: Aadam xayloy sheytan Yallih gitak sin makkoyse waay sin namma Xaltani Aadam kee Cawwa makkoyseeh jannatak kah yeyyeeqe innah ken Qawrat ken yayballuh ken sara keenik Haduffu hee, diggah usuk kaa kee kay Samadaay kay Qande isin ken kak able waytan kabuk sin table, diggah nanu sheytoona Yalla nummayse waa marih awlaytit ken abne
